title: Hands of a Stranger (1962, Horror) Paul Lukather, Joan Harvey, James Noah | Movie

sources.title: Hands of a Stranger (1962, Horror) Paul Lukather, Joan Harvey, James Noah | Movie
sources.description:
They gave him the hands of a killer!
A surgeon must graft new hands on a concert pianist to replace his badly mangled ones. However, after the operation, the pianist comes to believe that his new hands have a mind of their own, and are trying to force him to commit evil acts.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/DwDtYririX4


Original title: Hands of a Stranger (1962) AKA: The Answer
Subtitles available in many language options.

Director & Writer: Newt Arnold 
Stars: Paul Lukather, Joan Harvey, James Noah 
Genres: Classics, Cult Film, Horror, Thriller


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
03:47 A mysterious murder investigation unfolds during a piano concert, revealing intricate details about the victim.
11:23 The significance of hands and relationships in a mysterious and dramatic storyline.
15:39 Uncovering the dark truth behind a man's severed and bloody gloves leads to a shocking revelation.
21:18 A medical experiment goes wrong, leading to ethical dilemmas and potential consequences for the characters involved.
29:58 Mysterious events unfold after a man's hand is injured in a taxi accident, leading to unexpected consequences.
32:23 Medical experiment results in successful hand transplant, challenging beliefs and showcasing courage and creativity.
39:23 A medical drama unfolds as a patient faces the reality of having new hands and must decide to accept or fight against it.
48:48 A mysterious encounter leads to a chilling revelation about a new pair of hands.
53:08 A pianist helps a troubled man cope with loss and find peace through music.
56:52 Exploration of the impact of hand transplants on individuals' lives and identities.
1:09:19 Summary of a horror movie involving a mysterious death and a doctor's investigation.
1:14:16 Mysterious events unfold after a man finds his son dead, leading to a series of tragic incidents involving human hands.
1:19:39 A mysterious conversation unfolds between two individuals regarding a significant event.
